revision.text: Possibly: A Guide to Classical Learning: or, Polymetis Abridged, by Joseph Spence. (London : Printed for R. Horsfield, in Ludgate-Street; and J. Dodsley, in Pall-Mall, MDCCLXVIII. [1768]). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2379624~S1; OR: Polymetis : or, An enquiry concerning the agreement between the works of the Roman poets, and the remains of the antient artists : being an attempt to illustrate them mutually from one another ..., by Joseph Spence. (London : Printed for R. and J. Dodsley, 1774). http://www.worldcat.org/oclc/977695320
